p: Another emerging children-related issue is a multisystem inflammatory syndrome mentioned in a scientific brief report published by the WHO on May 15, 2020 [ 64]. The report describes clusters of children and adolescents requiring admission to intensive care units; these children have a multisystem inflammatory condition, with some features similar to those of Kawasaki disease and toxic shock syndrome, in Europe and North America [ 65 66 67]. This syndrome has not been reported in other regions thus far, but the full spectrum of the disease is still unclear. Hence, special attention should be warranted to all children with COVID-19 [ 68].
